tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IrrigationSystemData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weather_data JSON,
    soil_moisture INT,
    pump_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSystem (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50),
  last_checked TIMESTAMP,
  water_flow_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    air_pressure FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    max_capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    frequency INT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS WeatherData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  pressure FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS IrrigationSystems (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS IrrigationLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  amount_watered FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS WeatherForecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  forecast_date DATE,
  forecasted_temperature FLOAT,
  forecasted_humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UserSettings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  system_id INT
)
